comment.body: @Fav: is more effective way to host images and avoid duplication, zeronet does not have a way to avoid duplication even if content.json files have a list of all files in a zsite, for example you need to download index.html for every zeroblog and have a local copy of the file even if you already have  the file in another folder and even with the same hash in content.json .... now go and make a blog about it :P
@狗蛋: https://ipfs.pics/ works in my firefox version 48

@Fav: no, it need to implement a system do avoid duplication and duplication download, IPFs have some content filtering for DMCA take downs and that open the door for massive censorship for those who control the filter list
@狗蛋: let me guess you are on windows :D

your file on red is stuck 

`data/users/1FtUiy2KtVRiLTjs2QrvDJUSx2wMzeeavX/data.json`
now someone need to make a bridge between ipfs and torrents
@Andrewm: yes u can stream IPFS but u cant bridge peers on the same way webtorrent  and classic torrent
